name: Miner Ultra Adventures 2
description:
Our friend Miner is back !!! Amazing adventures with extreme difficulty, this 3d platform game will surprise you and give you a lot of satisfaction to overcome all the challenges !!! Be versatile and have quick reflexes to be the best !!!

  • Real Physics.
  • Bubblegum Rope.
  • Excellent for Speedrun.
  • Super Ultra Adventures.
  • Cool Toon Shader.
  • Extreme Difficult.
  • Many Crazy Levels.
  • Super Fun Multiplayer.
  • Radical Movements.
  • Cool Food power ups.
  • An intense game.
  • Kids love this game.
